A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Days Of Our Lives meets Spaceballs.  The feminists had their hands all over this one.  The male lead characters were portrayed as disobedient and irrational hot heads which required powerful women to set them straight and save the day.  Let's not forget to satisfy the activists by saving the space horses on a 45 minute sequence that lead to absolutely nowhere.  More plot holes than Swiss cheese.  Purposely created to see if this movie could win the \"shock and awe\" contest that has taken over Hollywood in regards to plot twists and surprises.  This movie is terrible!
